Introduction
This topic contains special instructions for handling cases involving administrative error, including
definition of an administrative error
determining whether to attribute the erroneous payment of benefits to administrative error
erroneous payment of benefits due to
a system malfunction or programming error
, and
claims-processing delays
example of an administrative error on the part of VA
user entry of a child’s date of birth (DOB) that differs from the date the beneficiary provided
instructions for handling an administrative error
approval of administrative decisions involving administrative error
, and
requesting Compensation or Pension and Fiduciary (P&F) Service’s approval of administrative decisions
.
title: M21-1, Part VI, Subpart i, Chapter 2, Section B - Correcting the Erroneous Payment of Benefits to a Beneficiary
citation: Part VI, Subpart i, Chapter 2, Section B
